title: binary_artifacts.yaml
description: The schema for OpenSSF's Allstar dangerous workflow configuration

OptOutStrategy.description: OptOutStrategy : set to true to change from opt-in to opt-out.

OptInRepos.description: OptInRepos is the list of repos to opt-in when in opt-in strategy.

OptOutRepos.description: OptOutRepos is the list of repos to opt-out when in opt-out strategy.

OptOutPrivateRepos.description: OptOutPrivateRepos : set to true to not access private repos.

OptOutPublicRepos.description: OptOutPublicRepos : set to true to not access public repos.

OptOutArchivedRepos.description: OptOutArchivedRepos : set to true to opt-out archived repositories.

OptOutForkedRepos.description: OptOutForkedRepos : set to true to opt-out forked repositories.

DisableRepoOverride.description: DisableRepoOverride : set to true to disallow repos from opt-in/out in their config.
